gw.plugin.claimsearch

Interface IClaimSearchPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IClaimSearchPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    IClaimSearchPlugin contains methods that search for claims for a given policy and can retrieve information about a specific claim.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClaimDetail getClaimDetail(Claim claim)
      Returns the claimDetail for a giving claim number.
      void giveUserViewPermissionsOnClaim(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String claimPublicID)
      Gives a PC user denoted by username permission to view the claimNumber in the external claim system.
      ClaimSet searchForClaims(IClaimSearchCriteria claimSearchCriteria)
      Searches for claims with the given search criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • searchForClaims

        ClaimSet searchForClaims(IClaimSearchCriteria claimSearchCriteria)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         java.net.ConnectException
        Searches for claims with the given search criteria.
        Parameters:
        claimSearchCriteria - the search criteria interface for which we want to retrieve claims
        Returns:
        a ClaimSet containing all claims found in the given PolicyPeriod
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.net.ConnectException

      • getClaimDetail

        ClaimDetail getClaimDetail(Claim claim)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                           java.net.ConnectException
        Returns the claimDetail for a giving claim number. If no claim with the matching claim number is found in the database, returns null.
        Parameters:
        claim - the claim to search for.
        Returns:
        the found ClaimDetail object, or null if no claim found with the specified claim number.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.net.ConnectException

      • giveUserViewPermissionsOnClaim

        void giveUserViewPermissionsOnClaim(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String claimPublicID)
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                    java.net.ConnectException
        Gives a PC user denoted by username permission to view the claimNumber in the external claim system. It is expected that this method will throw an appropriate RemoteException if the username or claim do not exist in the external claim system.
        Parameters:
        username - the user who should be given permission
        claimPublicID - the claim they should be allowed to view
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.net.ConnectException
